articles.author: Louise Guillot
articles.title: Gaza truce talks in Paris reportedly making 'significant progress' - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Efforts to broker a truce appeared to regain momentum after a senior U.S. envoy for the Middle East met with Israeli leaders.
articles.content:
These talks come as air strikes killed about a hundred people in the Gaza Strip on Friday, according to Hamas.

articles.author: Kyle Melnick
articles.title: Ancient reptile fossil was forged with paint, new study says - The Washington Post
articles.description: European researchers said in a new study that a vital reptile fossil believed to be about 280 million years old was forged with paint.
articles.content: While researcher Valentina Rossi was studying a fossil long believed to be a 280 million-year-old outline of a novel reptile species, she noticed something odd about the reptiles skin it was black pa… [+4343 chars]
